
(s2 / say-01
      :ARG0 (b2 / book)
      :ARG1 (s / swallow-01
            :ARG0 (b / boa
                  :mod (c / constrictor))
            :ARG1 (p / prey
                  :mod (w / whole)
                  :poss b)
            :manner (c2 / chew-01 :polarity -
                  :ARG0 b
                  :ARG1 p)))
